channel.title: Server Crashes
channel.description: Anytime someone pk's on my server the event manager crashes it because it reads a player has logged out during an event. Where would I go to fix this?

item.title: Server Crashes
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

soamazinq:

Anytime someone pk’s on my server the event manager crashes it because it reads a player has logged out during an event. Where would I go to fix this?

Probably somewhere in the death handler, or combat code…
Can you get a picture of any errors?

The EventManager that’s in PI doesn’t run in sync with the server, and it may be the EventManager itself causing a timing issue… You should consider switching over to a task system that is in sync… The popular one being the CycleEvent system.
http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/tutorials/353294-modified-cycle-based-event-handler.html The original one is also linked in that thread.
